nodes.text: An antistress capsule was a medicinal capsule that Viceroy Nute Gunray secretly slipped between his lips, while Darth Sidious was momentarily focused on Rune Haako and Daultay Dofine. He did this to quell his anxiety at the disappearance of his lieutenant Hath Monchar, whose errant ventures had annoyed the Dark Lord most severely.
